insert into hr_person (person_id, persom_number, last_name_cn, first_name_cn, last_name_en, first_name_en, middle_name_en, english_name, gender, email_address, person_type_id, seeded_person_type_key, user_person_type, location_id, location_code, location_name, mob_phone_number, bank_name, bank_branch_name, bank_sub_branch_name, bank_account, effective_start_date, assignment_status_type, action_code, travel_subsidies, department_id, department_code, department_name, job_id, job_code, job_name, manager_id, manager_num, manager, legal_entities_id, legal_entities_code, legal_entities_name, company_name, actual_termination_date) values
(#{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{persomNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstNameCn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{middleNameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personTypeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{seededPersonTypeKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPersonType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{locationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankBranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankSubBranchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effectiveStartDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{assignmentStatusType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{travelSubsidies,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{departmentCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{jobCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{managerNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalEntitiesId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{legalEntitiesCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{legalEntitiesName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actualTerminationDate,jdbcType=DATE} )
